column2: Green salad with assorted veggies, 3-4 oz tuna or salmon
Black bean soup with whole grain cornbread
Yogurt parfait (plain Greek yogurt, berries & other seasonal fruit, 1 T ground flax or chia seeds, pinch of cinnamon)
Baked sweet potato with butter & cinnamon, kale salad
Moroccan chicken with golden roasted cauliflower
Green salad with assorted veggies, 1 cup beans (garbanzo, kidney  or black)
Fresh seasonal fruit with handful of raw nuts
Ratatouille with added cannellini beans, arugula salad
Celery sticks or apple slices with nut butter
Edamame and salmon stir-fry with miso butter and rice noodles with sauted bok choy
Oatmeal with slivered almonds, cinnamon, raisins (1/3 cup)
Grass-fed burger (beef, lamb, bison or turkey) with Moroccan sweet potato salad, roasted brussel sprouts
Whole wheat blueberry pancakes with blueberry drizzle
Green salad with assorted veggies, 3-4 oz grilled chicken, homemade dressing
Grilled fish tacos with cabbage slaw
Roasted vegetable soup or other seasonal veggie soup
Stir-fried baby bok choy with shiitake mushrooms & sesame crusted tofu
